description: You try to sneak up to a herdmate’s stash but get caught, and they take 200 berries from your stash!
You try to snatch berries, but a herdmate catches you, and in the scuffle, you lose 150 of your own!
You sneak around, but you accidentally bump into a rock, alerting a herdmate, and you lose 250 berries in the scramble.
You make a move for a herdmate’s stash, but they hear a twig snap and look over just in time to stop you.
You try to sneak in for 500 berries, but a branch grabs your crest, causing you to get stuck and spotted!
You think you’ve got a quick getaway, but the Parasaurolophus stops, stares right at you, and takes their berries back.
You attempt a quick grab but end up tripping, causing you to lose 300 berries while getting away.
You think you’re clever, but you misstep on some dry leaves and give yourself away!
You attempt to steal some berries but trip over your own feet, landing face-first in a bush.
You sneak up for a quick grab, but you manage to step right into a hole. You get stuck, and while you're stuck in place, the other Parasaurolophus casually snatches 100 berries from your stash.
You reach for your friend’s stash, but you accidentally knock over a tree branch that swings back and slaps you in the face.
You make your move, but you step into a mud pit and get stuck halfway. While you're stuck in the muck, a friend swipes 250 berries from your stash.
You go for the berries, but your herdmate turns around just in time, taking 150 of your berries in the process as you freeze in surprise.
You attempt a quick steal, but a herdmate spots you while you stand there frozen in guilt.
You quietly slip behind a distracted herdmate, snatching 700 berries from their stash before they even notice.
You trick a herdmate into stampeding, and snatched 500 of her berries!
You challenge a herdmate to a race, but while they’re busy sprinting, you grab 500 of their berries and stash them in your pouch.
You distracted a herdmate with a loud honk and stole 300 berries!
You bumped into someone “accidentally” and took 600 berries!
You made up a “new berry law” and took 500 berries in “taxes”!
You ask to “see” a herdmate’s berries, then slyly walk off with 700 of them.
You distract a herdmate by grooming them, and while they’re relaxed, you swipe 400 berries.
You pose as a berry inspector and leave with 600 berries after they “pass inspection.”
You play dead to fool a herdmate, then spring to life and steal 450 berries!
You start a group song, then slyly swipe 400 berries while everyone sings!
You flatter a herdmate’s crest, then grab 600 berries while they’re flattered.
You ask to carry a herdmate’s berries, but just run off with 500 of them!
You shout “predator!” and while the herd is distracted, you snatch 350 berries from them.
You tell a herdmate it’s “for science” and take 650 berries as part of your research.
You join a nap circle, then wake up to find 500 more berries in your stash.
You convince a herdmate to “share” their berries, then walk off with 600 of them.
You ask to “hold” the berries for a friend while they sleep, then keep 700 berries for yourself!
You trade a herdmate for a “mystical” rock for 600 berries in exchange.
You perform a “berry blessing” and take 600 berries as a “gift.”
You ask to “borrow” a berry for a taste test and walk off with 700.
You act as if you’ve spotted a rare berry, then snatch 500 from another Parasaurolophus' pile.
You pretend to “inspect” their berries for quality and leave with 400 in hand.
You offer a berry “cleaning service” and take 500 berries as payment.
You convince the herd that berries need “proper storage,” then take 600 while they help.
You distract a friend with a berry joke, then swipe 350 berries while they laugh.
You tell them you’ve found a “berry secret,” then take 500 berries as part of the discovery!
